aveBallsBowled(ArrayList<Player>) - Method in class pcricketstats.StatUtilities
This method gets the average number of balls bowled for each player, over the whole data set.
aveBallsBowled(ArrayList<Player>, String) - Method in class pcricketstats.StatUtilities
This overloaded method calculates the average amount of balls bowled per player, in a particular country.

aveStrikeRate(ArrayList<Player>, String) - Method in class pcricketstats.StatUtilities
